name: True Image Script
summary: Learn about .TIS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: In September 2021, Acronis renamed True Image to Cyber Protect Home Office and then changed it back to True Image in 2024.

description: A TIS file is a backup script used by Acronis Windows backup software including True Image and Backup & Recovery. It saves a series of commands used for automating backup tasks. TIS files are often used by system administrators for scheduling backups in enterprise environments.
